Control Name: 4.8.1 All single points of failure have been eliminated from application communication flows.
Control Statement: Have all single points of failure been eliminated from the data path (on-premises and Azure)? i.e. no single VM NVA or no single ExpressRoute connection

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.8 What decisions have been taken to ensure networking and connectivity meets your reliability requirements?
